        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Daily time range (in UTC) during which MemoryDB begins taking a daily snapshot of your shard. Example: <code>05:00-09:00</code>.</p>

            title="">

        <span class="property-type"><a href="#getclustershard">List&lt;Get<wbr>Cluster<wbr>Shard&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Set of shards in this cluster.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="snapshotretentionlimit_java">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Integer</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The number of days for which MemoryDB retains automatic snapshots before deleting them. When set to <code>0</code>, automatic backups are disabled.</p>

            title="">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Daily time range (in UTC) during which MemoryDB begins taking a daily snapshot of your shard. Example: <code>05:00-09:00</code>.</p>

            title="">
        <span id="snstopicarn_java">

        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Daily time range (in UTC) during which MemoryDB begins taking a daily snapshot of your shard. Example: <code>05:00-09:00</code>.</p>
